channel.title: Cant connect to my own ip :S
channel.description:
i cant connect to my own ip address but others can i can use 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 but not my no-ip.
dont tell me i cant because ive done it before but i dont know how... any ideas how come i cant connect to my own server using my no-ip?

item.title: Cant connect to my own ip :S
item.dc:creator: @i_spy_arr0w i spy arr0w
item.description:
@i_spy_arr0w wrote:

Usually you can’t,
Why don’t you just use your 0.0.0.0 ip instead of going through all the hassle and fixing your no-ip.

Read full topic
item.source: Cant connect to my own ip :S

item.title: Cant connect to my own ip :S
item.dc:creator: @The_cook_from_runesc The cook from runescape
item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

Your IP has probably blown up your internet, try restarting.

In lighter news, turn off your firewall.
